Maskapai Ini Dikecam, Tampilkan Adegan Film Homoseksual
03 Nov 2019, 10:10 by Afif Farhan


Ilustrasi pesawat (Thinkstock)

Jakarta - Film merupakan hiburan dalam pesawat yang bisa dinikmati penumpang. Namun maskapai ini, tampilkan film yang justru mendapat kecaman.Dirangkum detikcom dari berbagai sumber, Minggu (3/11/2019) maskapai Delta Airlines asal AS baru-baru ini mendapat kecaman karena menampilkan film yang kontennya LGBT seperti film Booksmart. Bahkan, banyak perkataan dan adegan film yang menjurus pada homoseksual dan lesbian yang lolos sensor.Banyak penumpang yang mengeluhkan dan curhat di media sosial. Apalagi di pesawat, banyak penumpang yang masih anak-anak dan remaja.Lantas tak lama, Delta Airlines merilis permintaan maaf. Mereka memastikan akan memeriksa dan menyensor adegan-adegan film yang dinilai tidak pantas."Kami sedang meninjau proses vendor penyunting pihak ketiga kami untuk memastikan bahwa mereka selaras dengan nilai-nilai keberagaman kami," tulis pernyataan Delta Airlines."Studio sering menyediakan video dalam dua bentuk versi teater asli dan versi yang diedit. Kami memilih versi yang diedit dan sekarang menyadari masih ada adegan yang tidak pantas, maka kami akan memastikan hal ini tidak terjadi lagi," sambung pernyataannya.Simak Video "Waduh! The airline is condemned, shows scenes of Homosexual films
03 Nov 2019, 10:10 by Afif Farhan


Illustration of a plane (Thinkstock)

Jakarta - Films are entertainment in aircraft that passengers can enjoy. However, this airline, showing films that actually received criticism. Summarized detikcom from various sources, Sunday (11/03/2019) Delta Airlines airline from the US recently received criticism for showing LGBT content such as the Booksmart movie. In fact, many sayings and scenes of the film that lead to homosexuals and lesbians who pass the censorship. Many passengers complained and vent on social media. Especially on the plane, many passengers are still children and adolescents. Then soon, Delta Airlines released an apology. They made sure to check and censor film scenes that were deemed inappropriate. "We are reviewing our third-party editing vendor process to ensure that they are in line with our diversity values," wrote Delta Airlines statement. "Studio often provides videos in two original theater version and edited version. We chose the edited version and now realize there are still inappropriate scenes, so we will make sure this does not happen again, "continued his statement. Watch Video" Wow!
